name: sixth
content:

A2 6th written as a word: I have to return my library books on the sixth (of July). Jim was/came sixth in the 100 metres.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is my sixth class.It's the sixth jacket I've bought this season.She came sixth in the race.He was the sixth person to arrive at the meeting.It was United's sixth consecutive win this season.

(in the position of) the number 6 in a series; 6th: This skater is ranked sixth in the world. [ C ] We leave on the sixth of June.
A sixth is one of six equal parts of something.
